name: KneeReplacementSurgeryICD9CM
title: Knee Replacement Surgery ICD9CM
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have  total knee replacement procedures.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a total knee replacement procedure.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent the surgical procedure of a total knee replacement.  Codes used are to be ICD9CM Procedure codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
